about_the_game:
Scarlet Defiance: The Wall Between Us is a short yuri visual novel about two young women on a journey to find their true purposes in life. In this prologue, each deals with their own struggles as they find themselves on a path that inevitably intertwines with one another.





『One wall, two lovers, and a prophecy that could change it all.』

In a world divided by a wall, humans and vampires live in a tense ceasefire that could break with just one wrong move. However, some still believe in the prophecy that will end the war and the animosity between the two sides once and for all.

Explore this beautiful visual novel from two perspectives:



Sofia Agapov

「The Leader of the Resistance Army」
A powerful soldier with a secret that can destroy everything she has created. Torn between duty and desire, her obsession with the one who can end it all will either be her salvation or her downfall. Which one will it be?





Vlatka Răzvan Zugravescu

「The Vampire Princess of the Prophecy」
A vampire princess with the weight of the world on her shoulders. Destined to be the link between two worlds, she must first return the honor and power her family lost. Will she achieve her purpose? Who is this girl she keeps dreaming of?




An isolated country with two halves, one human and one demon. A country that had always been in a state of discord and chaos until the current ceasefire. Now, a wall divides it all, keeping each half away from each other.

Kremlinstal,「The City of Steel」of the Dominion of Pregrada
An industry-dominated, devoted to military production, steel city, built to cage its citizens more than protect them. Ruled by an authoritarian government whose hidden agenda can break the fragile peace…

Cresteras,「Crown City」of the Kingdom of Vesnica
A kaleidoscope of extravagant, detailed, colorful manors, where your social status can determine your entire life. Ruled by monarchs, or so the Elder Council wants you to believe…



  • A short dark fantasy story told in two different POVs. See the story unfold from both Sofia and Vlatka's POVs, and experience heart-warming moments, tears, betrayal, and much, much more
  • A beautiful original soundtrack with over 10 songs that fit every moment in the story
  • Breathtaking, animated CGs to enhance your visual novel experience
  • An art gallery featuring all the backgrounds and CGs found in the story

content_descriptors.notes:
Certain chapters in this game depict violence (including death), mature language, slightly revealing outfits, and intimate scenes. However, there is no sexual content involved, and all of these are depicted through text, not imagery. 

Trigger warning: Gunshots, blood, death

short_description: In this dark fantasy yuri visual novel, follow the events that lead up to the fateful meeting of two young women. Accompany Sofia, a human revolutionary, and Vlatka, the vampire princess, as they navigate political upheaval, forbidden romance, and the ugliness of war.
